verses.verse: There was<WH1961> a man<WH376> in the land<WH776> of Uz,<WH5780> whose name<WH8034> was Job;<WH347> and that<WH1931> man<WH376> was<WH1961> perfect<WH8535> and upright,<WH3477> and one that feared<WH3373> God,<WH430> and eschewed<WH5493> evil.<WH4480> <WH7451>
And there were born<WH3205> unto him seven<WH7651> sons<WH1121> and three<WH7969> daughters.<WH1323>

His substance<WH4735> also was<WH1961> seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> sheep,<WH6629> and three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> camels,<WH1581> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> yoke<WH6776> of oxen,<WH1241> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> she asses,<WH860> and a very<WH3966> great<WH7227> household;<WH5657> so that this<WH1931> man<WH376> was<WH1961> the greatest<WH1419> of all<WH4480> <WH3605> the men<WH1121> of the east.<WH6924>

And his sons<WH1121> went<WH1980> and feasted<WH6213> <WH4960> in their houses,<WH1004> every one<WH376> his day;<WH3117> and sent<WH7971> and called<WH7121> for their three<WH7969> sisters<WH269> to eat<WH398> and to drink<WH8354> with<WH5973> them.

And it was<WH1961> so, when<WH3588> the days<WH3117> of their feasting<WH4960> were gone about,<WH5362> that Job<WH347> sent<WH7971> and sanctified<WH6942> them, and rose up early<WH7925> in the morning,<WH1242> and offered<WH5927> burnt offerings<WH5930> according to the number<WH4557> of them all:<WH3605> for<WH3588> Job<WH347> said,<WH559> It may be<WH194> that my sons<WH1121> have sinned,<WH2398> and cursed<WH1288> God<WH430> in their hearts.<WH3824> Thus<WH3602> did<WH6213> Job<WH347> continually.<WH3605> <WH3117>

Now there was<WH1961> a day<WH3117> when the sons<WH1121> of God<WH430> came<WH935> to present themselves<WH3320> before<WH5921> the LORD,<WH3068> and Satan<WH7854> came<WH935> also<WH1571> among<WH8432> them.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Satan,<WH7854> Whence<WH4480> <WH370> comest<WH935> thou? Then Satan<WH7854> answered<WH6030> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> From going to and fro<WH4480> <WH7751> in the earth,<WH776> and from walking up and down<WH4480> <WH1980> in it.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Satan,<WH7854> Hast thou considered<WH7760> <WH3820> <WH5921> my servant<WH5650> Job,<WH347> that<WH3588> there is none<WH369> like him<WH3644> in the earth,<WH776> a perfect<WH8535> and an upright<WH3477> man,<WH376> one that feareth<WH3373> God,<WH430> and escheweth<WH5493> evil?<WH4480> <WH7451>
Then Satan<WH7854> answered<WH6030> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> Doth Job<WH347> fear<WH3372> God<WH430> for naught?<WH2600>

Hast not<WH3808> thou<WH859> made a hedge<WH7753> about<WH1157> him, and about<WH1157> his house,<WH1004> and about<WH1157> all<WH3605> that<WH834> he hath on every side?<WH4480> <WH5439> thou hast blessed<WH1288> the work<WH4639> of his hands,<WH3027> and his substance<WH4735> is increased<WH6555> in the land.<WH776>
But <WH199> put forth<WH7971> thine hand<WH3027> now,<WH4994> and touch<WH5060> all<WH3605> that<WH834> he hath, and<WH518> he will curse<WH1288> thee to<WH5921> thy face.<WH6440>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Satan,<WH7854> Behold,<WH2009> all<WH3605> that<WH834> he hath is in thy power;<WH3027> only<WH7535> upon<WH413> himself put not forth<WH408> <WH7971> thine hand.<WH3027> So Satan<WH7854> went forth<WH3318> from<WH4480> <WH5973> the presence<WH6440> of the LORD.<WH3068>
And there was<WH1961> a day<WH3117> when his sons<WH1121> and his daughters<WH1323> were eating<WH398> and drinking<WH8354> wine<WH3196> in their eldest<WH1060> brother's<WH251> house: <WH1004>
And there came<WH935> a messenger<WH4397> unto<WH413> Job,<WH347> and said,<WH559> The oxen<WH1241> were<WH1961> plowing,<WH2790> and the asses<WH860> feeding<WH7462> beside<WH5921> <WH3027> them:

And the Sabeans<WH7614> fell<WH5307> upon them, and took them away;<WH3947> yea, they have slain<WH5221> the servants<WH5288> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword;<WH2719> and I<WH589> only<WH7535> am escaped<WH4422> alone<WH905> to tell<WH5046> thee.

While he<WH2088> was yet<WH5750> speaking,<WH1696> there came<WH935> also another,<WH2088> and said,<WH559> The fire<WH784> of God<WH430> is fallen<WH5307> from<WH4480> heaven,<WH8064> and hath burned up<WH1197> the sheep,<WH6629> and the servants,<WH5288> and consumed<WH398> them; and I<WH589> only<WH7535> am escaped<WH4422> alone<WH905> to tell<WH5046> thee.

While he<WH2088> was yet<WH5750> speaking,<WH1696> there came<WH935> also another,<WH2088> and said,<WH559> The Chaldeans<WH3778> made<WH7760> out three<WH7969> bands,<WH7218> and fell<WH6584> upon<WH5921> the camels,<WH1581> and have carried them away,<WH3947> yea, and slain<WH5221> the servants<WH5288> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword;<WH2719> and I<WH589> only<WH7535> am escaped<WH4422> alone<WH905> to tell<WH5046> thee.

While he<WH2088> was yet<WH5750> speaking,<WH1696> there came<WH935> also another,<WH2088> and said,<WH559> Thy sons<WH1121> and thy daughters<WH1323> were eating<WH398> and drinking<WH8354> wine<WH3196> in their eldest<WH1060> brother's<WH251> house: <WH1004>

And, behold,<WH2009> there came<WH935> a great<WH1419> wind<WH7307> from<WH4480> <WH5676> the wilderness,<WH4057> and smote<WH5060> the four<WH702> corners<WH6438> of the house,<WH1004> and it fell<WH5307> upon<WH5921> the young men,<WH5288> and they are dead;<WH4191> and I<WH589> only<WH7535> am escaped<WH4422> alone<WH905> to tell<WH5046> thee.
Then Job<WH347> arose,<WH6965> and rent<WH7167> <WH853> his mantle,<WH4598> and shaved<WH1494> <WH853> his head,<WH7218> and fell down<WH5307> upon the ground,<WH776> and worshiped,<WH7812>

And said,<WH559> Naked<WH6174> came I out<WH3318> of my mother's womb,<WH4480> <WH990> <WH517> and naked<WH6174> shall I return<WH7725> thither:<WH8033> the LORD<WH3068> gave,<WH5414> and the LORD<WH3068> hath taken away;<WH3947> blessed<WH1288> be<WH1961> the name<WH8034> of the LORD.<WH3068>
In all<WH3605> this<WH2063> Job<WH347> sinned<WH2398> not,<WH3808> nor<WH3808> charged<WH5414> God<WH430> foolishly.<WH8604>
